title: Technology-Integrated Instructional Design Simulation Based on Learner Perspectives in Early Childhood Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Preservice teachers virtually experience the role of early childhood learners in VR environments and design technology-integrated lessons

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three principles of designing digital tool-based lessons reflecting young learners' perspectives.
Learners can adjust technology integration strategies by analyzing young learners' responses in simulated environments.
Learners can develop learner-centered technology-integrated lesson plans in project format and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
